Articles.Content:
Floor 2600: Another File Storage, seems to be from more users files...

 

Cuz this is New Page! New Page night! And no one's gonna save you from the Beasts who celebrate new Pages!

You know it's New Page! New Page night! You're fighting for your life inside a Poster, New Page Tonight!

-Thriller-

Edited February 9, 2022 by Venusian Explorer
*sigh* tyops.

Floor 2600b: It's still the new page.

Edited February 9, 2022 by kerbiloid

Floor 2601: Blank space. Nothing inside. But then you hear:

'Cause they see right through me, they see right through me, they see right through, can you see right through me?
They see right through. they see right through me, I see right through me! I see right through me!

Floor 2603! (Yay!) A giant cake. You have no idea how long you've been climbing for, so you stop to eat and rest.

Edited February 9, 2022 by Akagi

It's dry, hard, and untasty.

Spoiler

You realize that it's a slag cake, and pass to the Floor 2604, where a heap of same cakes stands in the middle of the room.
Floor 2605: A giant bouncy house.

Floor 2606 is a bunch of office chairs. They are the best office chairs out there! You roll around in a chair for a bit. You walk up the stairs to the next floor.

Edited February 9, 2022 by BekfastDerp13
Floor 2607: A bed and a hot meal. You eat the meal and go to sleep. Waking up after 9 hours, you continue, well fed and well rested.
Floor 2608 is covered in 2 feet tall snow! Unfortunately, no snow shoes are around. You slowly push your way through the thick snow. You make a snowball and keep it until it melts on an upper floor.
Floor 2609: An aged janitoress is shouting at you: "Why do all of you bring these snowballs here??? Stop doing that! Go and throw it out!"

Floor 2610.

A memorial commemorating the cricket-ant massacre on floor 2594.
Fllor 2611: Insectarium which has founded that memorial.
Floor 2612: The dead insects, all piled up.
Floor 2613: The Section of Disinsection.
Floor 2614: Deep Thought, thinking about 42.
Floor 2615: Mice.

Floor 2616: You pull out your towel and mop your brow, before sitting down to a table for brunch. Their is tea and biscuits and some nice cakes, also sanwiches with the crust cut off. Strangely 2 of those mice are pushing some sort of drill looking device towards you and mumbling about the needing to know the answer to the ultimate question of "Stairs the Elevators and Everything." They don't look too friendly. Suddenly they try to jump you. You manage to swat them away with the book you got on that previous floor, that has the words "Don't Panic" in nice friendly letters on the cover. You decide it is time to make a hasty retreat up the stairs. It seems the one thing that this floor can do without, is you!
Floor 2617: A lever! you wonder what does that lever do, so you pull it down, and then you go to the next floor. Let's hope that doesn't screw it up.
Floor 2618: Your friend that went up here, too. You follow him for the rest of the journey. Don't leave him behind!
Floor 2619. The friend sticks in textures and stays at this floor forever.
Floor 2620: You check your watch. It says you have been climbing for almost 9 years.
Floor 2621: A medieval village. Passing the smelly peasants, you head to the next floor. How old is this building?
Floor 2622: You realize you left the stove on.

Floor 2623: You bookmark this floor so you can come back to it easily, then jump out the window and glide all the way home. There is a massive amount of bills and mail. You put them all in your bag of holding for later perusal. Go in and turn everything off. Clear all the expired food out of the fridge. ( you didn't know you would be gone so long). Lock up. Open up your floor browser, click on your bookmark and you are back on floor 2623. You head on up to the next floor.
Floor 2624: Just a normal cubicle-manifested floor.
